      • validate

                          java.lang.String FieldName)
                   throws ValidationNotSupportedException,
                          MissingParameterException,
                          WrongOperatorException,
                          ValidationConfigNotFound
        Validate field against specific validation.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be validated
        FieldName - the field name
        Returns:
        the validation result
        Throws:
        ValidationNotSupportedException - the validation not supported exception
        MissingParameterException - the missing parameter exception
        WrongOperatorException - the wrong operator exception
        ValidationConfigNotFound - the validation configuration not found
